top_comments.comment: this is really pretty, and you're all so talanted, but this is obviously studio recorded, I love the setup though, and keep up the amazing vocals and talent<3
wooooooowwwww this is so perfect, i could spend the whole day watching this video on repeat

That was beyond good 🥺❤️ Amy's low parts in the beginning and her high parts at 02:48, followed by Christina's and Lauren's parts were incredible! Lisa's high part at 03:15 was pheeww 🤐❤️ Was so nice to hear Lisa and Lauren sing low parts as well. Loved this beyond words! ✨❤️
This is better, than the original.
